title: Koi ni wa Mukanai Shokugyou
sinopse:
Yori Kashii, the leader of the idol group D. BUG, has had hidden feelings for his former manager, Haruto Mikura. Mikura still treats him specially even after leaving, though Yori knows it's just because of work. However, those feelings finally overflow...?!

(Source: Shishokan, translated)
